name: Augustine Yap
text: This is tough. Lots of the top anime in MyAnimeList ( http://myanimelist.net/topanime.php ) are shounen, which easily get high scores for just being fun. And the few anime I rated 10/10 have low scores in the list.    That said, I think Mushishi is a fair compromise between stuff I like, and stuff other people like.
